## Reading json file to R

This script

```{r}
con <- file("./Data/obamacare_labeled.json",open = "r")
obamacare<-vector("list")
i=0
while(T){
  i<-i+1
  temp<-readLines(con,1)
  if(length(temp)==0){
    print("reach the end")
    break
  } else
  obamacare[[i]]<-fromJSON(temp)
}
close(con)

rm(con); rm(i); rm(temp)
save(obamacare,file="../R Project/Data/obamacare_relabeled.RData")
```
